name: KABOOM!
description: Nonprofit working to achieve play space equality for children.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to infrastructure and play space equity.
Issues related to local park infrastructure as it relates to funding and implementation of the CARES Act (P.L. 116-136).
Issues related to funding for public lands including, the Parks, Jobs, and Equity Act, the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (H.R. 3684), and the reconciliation bill.
Issues related to local park infrastructure as it relates to funding and federal implementation.
Issues related to funding for public lands including, the Parks, Jobs, and Equity Act and the Build Back Better Act.
